content:
The First Question is to provide a detail background of the selected sector with a full list of the public companies in the 
chosen ASEAN country (perform a systematic cross-checking with reliable sources other 
than Refinitiv, if needed). Deliberate the specific efforts by the Sector and the Government 
steering towards a green and sustainably economy in the post-pandemic new normal.
You are to include the most recent supporting facts and data post-2020. A discussion 
should follow right after the information provided.
